creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
illegible letters on the upper right corner (could be a part of the title)
10 names, 2 in center are probably the names of the two courtesans, the others could be the musicians' names
markings:
censor seal: kiwame 極; publisher's seal: Tsutaya Jūzaburō
Collector's seal: C.M. (Carl Mienzil)
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Untitled series of Niwaka festival dances representing the Twelve Months
title: The Ninth Month, The Dance of the Chrysanthemum Boy, Performed on a Stage
